content.html: In my morning GP clinic today, TWO THIRDS of patients (all F2F) booked in with potential Covid symptoms Only 1 had done a lateral flow About 1/2 were kids, so no masks 1 patient verbally abusive after I advised a Covid test Exhausted with this now. It’s just never ending.
content.value:
In my morning GP clinic today, TWO THIRDS of patients (all F2F) booked in with potential Covid symptoms 

Only 1 had done a lateral flow

About 1/2 were kids, so no masks

1 patient verbally abusive after I advised a Covid test 

Exhausted with this now. It’s just never ending.
